required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 10, 2022
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Astaxanthin on the Patients With Alzheimer Disease
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Astaxanthin on the Patients With Alzheimer Disease

lead_sponsor.agency: Kaohsiung Medical University Chung-Ho Memorial Hospital

clinical_study.source: Kaohsiung Medical University Chung-Ho Memorial Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: This study adapts a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial, to exam the possible benefit of Astaxanthin on Alzheimer disease. The enrolled Alzheimer patients will take Astaxanthin or placebo for 1 year. We will follow up Mini-Mental State Examination, Cognitive Ability Screening Instrument, Clinical Dementia Rating, and Neuropsychiatric Inventory at the end of the study.

detailed_description.textblock: This study aims to examine the benefit of Astaxanthin as adjuvant therapy for Alzheimer's disease.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: All participants receive MMSE when they are enrolled, and follow up annually for a total of 3 years.
All participants receive CASI when they are enrolled, and follow up annually for a total of 3 years.
All participants receive CDR when they are enrolled, and follow up annually for a total of 3 years.
All participants receive NPI when they are enrolled, and follow up annually for a total of 3 years.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of treatment-emergent adverse events [safety and tolerability]
secondary_outcome.description: Monitor possible adverse effects of Astaxanthin, namely bleeding, anemia, blood sugar, blood pressure, liver and renal functions.

clinical_study.condition: To Evaluate the Possible Benefit of Astaxanthin on Alzheimer Disease

arm_group.description: Compared the difference of changes in psychometrics between Astaxanthin users and placebo group.
Compared the difference in adverse effects between Astaxanthin users and placebo group.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. 60 ≦ age ≦ 90
2. Clinical Dementia Rating Scale = 0.5 or 1
3. Under treatment with donepezil、rivastigmine or galantamine with good medical adherence
4. Get a signed informed consent from the patient or his/her family
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Not using or poor medical adherence to donepezil、rivastigmine or galantamine
2. Combined using memantine or other cerebral perfusion enhancing agent, such as Piracetam, Dihydroergotoxine, Nicergoline etc.
3. New cerebrovascular disease happens during 3-year follow up
4. Mixed type dementia
5. Major psychiatric disease (such as depression, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia) or substance abuser (such as alcohol, illegal drug, hypnotics)
6. Heart failure, end stage renal disease, liver cirrhosis, or other major organ failure
7. Severe hearing impairment results in incomplete survey of neuropsychatric evaluation
8. No informed consent or no regular follow up

facility.name: Kaohsiung Medical University Chung-Ho Memorial Hospital

patient_data.ipd_description: Will not share individual participant data
